full_summary:
### Compensation Program Review Services

#### Notice Type
This is a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the provision of compensation program review services to the Senate of Canada.

#### Project Overview
The Senate is seeking a contractor to work with the Senate Administration to review its compensation programs as defined in the attached Statement of Work (Annex “A”). The services required are listed in Section 2 of the Statement of Work.

#### Tender Information

* **Tender Reference Number:** cb-8742-35116151
* **Contracting Entity:** Senate of Canada
* **Contracting Authority:** Proc-Appr@sen.parl.gc.ca
* **Contact Information:**
	+ Shirley Chartrand, Procurement Officer
	+ 613-995-8888 (phone)
	+ Proc-Appr@sen.parl.gc.ca (email)
	+ 40 Elgin Street, 11th floor, Ottawa, ON K1A 0A4, Canada
* **Tender Closing Date:** October 11, 2023 at 11:00:00 AM EDT
* **Amendment Number:** 6
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** Upon signature of contract
* **Expected Contract End Date:** April 30, 2024

#### Services Required

The successful contractor shall provide compensation program review services as defined in Annex “A”-Statement of Work.

#### Tender Evaluation Criteria

The evaluation criteria for this RFP are:

* Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

#### Instructions for the Tenderer

Please note that all RFP enquiries must be submitted by email to the contracting authority no later than September 18, 2023, 11:00 a.m. EDT. 

For a complete contract package and attachments, please visit the following website:

https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8742/finproc_rfp_sen-031-2023-24\_final\_e\_09052023.pdf

and

https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/12543/addendum-2-final\_e\_09282023.pdf

Note: This notice supercedes all previous notices for the above referenced contract.

#### Industry Category

The industry category for this contract is 80101511 (Human Resources consulting service) and 80111509 (Job evaluation service).
